Question: Although **** left the cabinet voluntarily, Washington never forgave him for his actions, and never spoke to him again.
Hints: In the following three weeks, this person shut himself in his room, where he paced back and forth until he was nearly exhausted.
Shortly before leaving office, in March 1809, this person signed the repeal of the disastrous Embargo.
This person and Hamilton were diametrically opposed on the issue of individual liberties.
